data.text: In that day there shall be a fountain opened
And it shall come to pass in that day, saith the Lord of hosts,
And it shall come to pass, that when any shall yet prophesy,
And it shall come to pass in that day,
But he shall say, I am no prophet, I am a husbandman;
And one shall say unto him, What are these wounds in thine hands?
Awake, O sword, against my shepherd, and against the man that is my fellow,
And it shall come to pass, that in all the land, saith the Lord,
And I will bring the third part through the fire,
